about_the_game:
Put your problem-solving skills to the test in Wet VR, a puzzle game where manipulating terrain and guiding water is the key to relaxing challenges and tricky trials.

Raise and lower the land to create pathways and control where the water flows. Each puzzle presents unique challenges, forcing you to think creatively and strategically in the beautiful, calming landscape.

Perfect for puzzle lovers with a creative streak, who enjoy a mix of tactile feedback and brain-teasing gameplay. Wet offers a relaxing yet stimulating cozy puzzle experience.

Features:

  • 32 dynamic puzzles to challenge your mind

  • Unique terrain manipulation mechanics

  • Water flow simulation for complex problem-solving

  • Beautiful, calming landscapes with soothing sounds

  • Endless replayability - try to complete each puzzle in the fewest possible terrain moves

  • Compete against others via Leaderboards

Get your problem-solving skills flowing, one puzzle at a time!

name: WET VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers

short_description: Play Wet VR, a calm puzzle game. Move land to guide water through 32 fun puzzles. Think smart and solve each task in a world of peace and ease. Simple to play, hard to master, and made to soothe your mind.
